subject: Need some help
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
MyCanadianPharmacy provides drugs at a cost well below our American counterparts. 
Click here to read more and make orderhttp://majoryet.hk
Experienced team, personal customer care, prompt delivery.No scamming, no frauds.
Yours,Josep Alvarado
